name: Titanium.UI.iOS.AlertDialogStyle
summary: A set of constants for the style that can be used for the style property of Titanium.UI.AlertDialog.

constants.name: DEFAULT
constants.summary: A standard alert dialog. This is the default value.

constants.name: LOGIN_AND_PASSWORD_INPUT
constants.summary: An alert dialog that allows the user to enter login identifier and password.

constants.name: PLAIN_TEXT_INPUT
constants.summary: An alert dialog that allows the user to enter text.

constants.name: SECURE_TEXT_INPUT
constants.summary: An alert dialog that allows the user to enter text. The text field is obscured.
